parameters: Didn't we just walk in here?
Thanks to me, you didn't get lost!
This house isn't some labyrinth, y'know.
The Lord Candidate must've had so much fun talking
with me it felt as if we came here in an instant.
Right, now that you said that...
Then, let's just go back to where we were.
I shall be your training partner...
Would you like to learn about training?
You can practice combat under guidance of the Familiar.
Since you will not be attacked during training,
you can safely check the performance of your skills.
You receive full recovery before and after training,
so no need to worry about the consumption of HP and SP.
Consumable items will be consumed as usual, though.
When you're satisfied, simply run away from the battle.
Just beat this chicken into a pulp.
You need some training? Let's go.
You're attacking so much it's not training anymore!
Good to see you, Lord Candidate.
I sell things that are useful for traveling, meow.
Unfortunate that the product lineup is of poor quality.
At this rate, I will be useless before long, meow.
So I have a request, Lord Candidate.
During your journey, should you find one with great
business sense, bring them to me.
\C[17]Mansion Shop\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
No... or rather, I myself could not comprehend
what it means to "have great business sense."
But isn't that one good enough already?
Need me for something, you say?
Are you good at business, meow?
Damn, I really thought that'd work.
Ah, but I can bring my own products in, right?
It's atleast better than the stuff sold here.
I look forward to my reward♥
So I might ask you about it in the future.
I humbly ask your cooperation in the future, meow.
Items able to be purchased in Earthless Ainoa increased!
During your journey, should you find one with great
business sense, bring them to me.
Lord Candidate, listen to my plea.
Do you want even more item variety?
No, that's another matter. Currently, I'm looking
for something called a \C[17]Flower of Dahna\C[0].
What are they even good for?
I'm paying attention to the monsters' possibilities...
It seems if I have this flower, I can do very
Then where would such a flower be?
That's where I have trouble with.
Tahati said it lives where deep forests span
and Dryads dwell, but I doubt I can find such a place.
Anyway, if you find any, please bring them to me.
I'm sure you will benefit from it, meow.
\C[17]Flower of Dahna\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
Did you find a Flower of Dahna?
This is the very thing, the Flower of Dana!
You seriously meant a Dryad Fragment...
Say so from the beginning, then!
...Looks to me like you asked for it
Above all, if there is no problem...
By the way, what can you do with that?
You can crystallize monsters' Skills, meow!
I believe Tahati was doing research on them.
This will surely help the Lord Candidate.
If you want to try it, give me a call.
You can now make Skill Crystals in Earthless Ainoa.
The types of skill crystals that can be made within
Ainoa will increase by obtaining special items.
Look for them during your trip.
If you find a Flower of Dahna, bring it to me.
Doing my best every day to be useful to Tahati, meow.
We don't need to send them back... right?
I have mad skillz, so how about
I make some things for you?
If you give some to me, I'll give nice rewards.
You have a peculiar feel about you...
But, perhaps we can work this out.
\C[17]Stardust Collection\C[0] has been added to the Event List.
You can now make Engraves in Earthless Ainoa.
With this, I can make stronger Engraves.
I found some SUPER awesome materials around.
Now I can make some AMAZING Engraves!
It seems to be found in various places.
If I find it somewhere, I'll bring it to you.
If you find many, you'll be rewarded!
You've now given me \V[22] so far.
I'll give you this as thanks.
I'll exchange it for something nice!
I'll give you this as thanks.
I'll exchange it for something nice!
I'll give you this as thanks.
I'll exchange it for something nice!
I'll give you this as thanks.
Oh wow, oh wow, lots of Stardust!
What are you going to do with all that?
I just wanted it because it's beautiful.
I was able to exchange it for something,
It's a great feeling to be helpful!
Should we not bring any more, then?
If you have any left over, I'll take it.
I don't have any more rewards, though.
I'll bring it back if I find it, as always.
I'll exchange it for something nice!
I haven't got any this time.
Give it to me if you've got some, okay?
Could it be that you have too much Stardust?
Shall I take it for you?
Well, thank you for your help!

events.name: イベントアイコン刻印

parameters: I wonder what items you have.
The item list gets larger and larger!
You must complete the Event \C[17]Flower of Dahna\C[0].

events.name: イベントアイコン狩人

parameters: The urbanization boom has reached Ainoa!
WE HAVE SPECIAL PRODUCTS FOR SALE.
To proceed with this Event, the Event
WE HAVE SPECIAL PRODUCTS FOR SALE.

events.name: イベントアイコンロボ
